data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bakuradze, Giorgi (2017): Pterostichus neilgaimani sp. nov., a new species of ground beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae) from relict sacred grove in Eastern Georgia. Zootaxa 4329 (1): 91-95, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4329.1.6|1 occurrence
